useCases.title: What's your situation?

beginner.title: I'm launching my business
beginner.description: No website yet, I want to start with a professional presence that inspires trust.

pro.title: I have a website
pro.description: My website is outdated or no longer represents me, I want to modernize it.

booking.title: I want to automate
booking.description: I waste time on manual management, I want online bookings and payments.

sales.title: I want to sell online
sales.description: I offer products or services I want to sell directly on my site.

custom.title: Custom project
custom.description: Web, mobile, or cross-platform app: I want a custom technical solution.

whyMindzy.title: Why choose Mindzy?
whyMindzy.subtitle: What sets us apart from traditional agencies

specialized.title: Conversion experts
specialized.description: Sites designed to convert your visitors into clients.

turnkey.title: Turnkey solution
turnkey.description: We handle everything: design, content, SEO, launch.

results.title: Guaranteed results
results.description: Our clients see their business take off.

support.title: Dedicated support
support.description: A team available to support you.

items.title: An approach centered on your reality
items.description: We never start from a template or a rigid process. Every project begins with understanding your business, your workflows, and your constraints.

items.title: Custom projects, not products
items.description: We design websites, applications, and internal systems tailored to simple or complex needs, without forcing your project into a predefined framework.

items.title: Human and committed support
items.description: At Mindzy, you're not just another file. We guide, advise, and adjust the project with you at every step.

items.title: Built-in SEO expertise
items.description: Visibility is not an add-on, it's part of the project. SEO is integrated from the design phase to ensure a healthy and lasting foundation.

items.title: Projects built to last
items.description: We prioritize stability, clarity, and maintainability. The goal: a project that stays relevant and usable over time.

items.title: A consistent experience across all devices
items.description: Every project is designed to be fluid and consistent, regardless of the screen or context of use.

process.title: Understanding & scoping
process.description: We take the time to understand your business, goals, and constraints to define a clear and relevant framework.

process.title: Custom design
process.description: We design an approach tailored to your needs: structure, features, and technical directions, validated with you.

process.title: Development & adjustments
process.description: We develop the project progressively, with regular exchanges and adjustments based on your feedback.

process.title: Launch & support
process.description: The project is deployed and we remain available to support you in getting started and future evolutions.

engagements.title: A clear and transparent relationship
engagements.description: We work with clear exchanges, shared decisions, and a common vision of the project from the start.

engagements.title: A project designed with you
engagements.description: Every project is built in collaboration. Your feedback and understanding are an integral part of the process.

engagements.title: A solid and lasting foundation
engagements.description: We design stable, maintainable projects built to evolve, without unnecessary dependencies or superfluous complexity.

engagements.title: A responsible approach
engagements.description: We apply best practices in security, confidentiality, and reliability, adapted to the nature of your project.
